1100001101001100 0010101111010110 1 -> sum: 1110111100100011, cout: 0
0100101100001010 0010111011001011 0 -> sum: 0111100111010101, cout: 0
1101001110111010 0111001000101000 1 -> sum: 0100010111100011, cout: 1
1000000101100000 0101001011101101 1 -> sum: 1101010001001110, cout: 0
1000100100110110 1010101011000110 1 -> sum: 0011001111111101, cout: 1
1001111010000101 0100010000000100 0 -> sum: 1110001010001001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
